data.message: Hershey fonts are public domain single-stroke vector glyphs (designed for pen plotters) that enable generative typography. Unlike filled fonts, each letter is an SVG path you trace with a single line. The key to organic hand-drawn effects is applying perpendicular wave motion to each stroke using deterministic seeded randomness (Math.sin(seed * 12.9898 + 78.233) * 43758.5453).
